entity.name: Unoplat Technologies PVT. LTD.
entity.description: Unoplat is a bootstrapped open-source organization based in India, driven by a dedicated team of five professionals. Our mission is to empower individual developers to build enterprise-grade backend systems single-handedly. By focusing on cutting-edge solutions in code context provisioning and cloud-native platforms, we aim to revolutionize backend development, making it more accessible, scalable, and efficient for developers worldwide.

projects.name: Unoplat CodeConfluence
projects.description: Unoplat CodeConfluence is on a mission to become the definitive code context provider for any repository, seamlessly integrating across multiple domains. With deterministic, language-agnostic code parsing powered by CHAPI and ANTLR, it delivers precise insights that transcend traditional documentation. Engage effortlessly with your code through smart, context-aware interactions, empowering you to navigate and understand complex codebases with unmatched clarity and efficiency. In addition it will become the gen-ai interface for unoplat core in near future.

projects.name: Unoplat Core
projects.description: Unoplat Core empowers individual developers to build enterprise-grade, cloud-native backends with ease. By integrating High Availability, Fault Tolerance, Observability, Infrastructure as Code, and seamless CI/CD pipelines, it enables one person to achieve what usually requires a full team. Accelerate development with Template Driven Application Development (TDAD), offering ready-to-deploy templates for streaming, batch processing, BPMN workflows, and microservices.
